alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 01 at 4:27AM EDT until November 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT TODAY AREA WIDE DUE TO CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES COMBINED WITH GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI AND INTERIOR SOUTHWESTERN ALABAMA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 051, 052, 053, 054, 055, 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 067, 075, 076, 078, 079, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and persistent severe to extreme drought intensity over the local area can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
